long_description: The ERGObaby Original X-tra baby carrier provides large sizing for comfortable carrying and an ergonomically correct posture to support the growth of your baby's hips, pelvis and spine. Compared to the ERGObaby Original, the Original X-tra baby carrier features a longer waist belt and shoulder straps to accommodate taller and larger body types. Shoulder straps feature comfortable 1-in. high-density foam padding; shoulder straps and chest straps adjust to fit body heights with torsos up to 23 in. long. Waist belt with 0.25-in. high-density neoprene foam padding fits waists of 34 - 58 in. Weight of the child is balanced over the adult's hips and shoulders for carrying comfort. For baby's riding comfort, the child's weight is dispersed between the hips and thighs, helping eliminate spinal compression. 100% cotton design offers great breathability to help keep both baby and adult cool; carrier and hood are lined with soft, 400-threads-per-inch cotton poplin. Sleeping hood with elastic adjustability can be lengthened to keep up with your baby's growth. Zippered pocket securely stores small accessories and personal items. High-quality buckles and webbing along with reinforced stitching at all fabric intersections help ensure that the ERGObaby Original X-tra baby carrier will last a long time.
